names.pinyin: wen jing juan bi tang jia jian
names.english: modified warm the channels and alleviate impediments decoction
names.commonEnglish: Modified Warm the Channels and Alleviate Impediments Decoction

actions: Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes Blood, disperses Cold, reduces swelling and alleviates pain.

Releases the Exterior, assists Yang,adjusts the Ying and Wei, releases the muscle layer, warms the channels and collaterals to relieve pain, and warms and facilitates the flow of Qi through the channels and collaterals and Blood through the vessels.
Dispels Wind-Cold-Dampness, warms and unblocks the flow of Yang Qi and strengthens the sinews and bones.
Dispels Wind-Dampness and strengthens the sinews and bones.
Expels Wind-Dampness, disperses Cold, warms and activates the channels and stops pain.
Disperses Cold, scours out Wind, overcomes Dampness and stops pain.
Breaks up and drives out Blood Stasis, invigorates Blood circulation.
Strongly unblocks the channels, extinguishes Wind, dispels Wind from the sinews and strengthens tendons and bones.
Expels Wind, dries Dampness and stops pain and itching.
With Zhi Cao Wu and Zhi Chuan Wu, for severe pain.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, moderates spasms, alleviates pain,moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.

symptoms: Early stage: Early morning stiffness, heaviness, numbness and/or restricted movement
Joint pain, especially in the wrist, ankle, knee and elbow
The affected joints may feel Cold
There may be numbness and heaviness in the limbs
The pain is worse with Cold and better with warmth
The pain is aggravated by Wind
The joints cannot be flexed or extended
Painful area often feels cold to the touch
Pain worse at night and better during the day
Pain mostly affects low back and lower extremities
Numbness of the muscles and skin
Hemiplegia, especially of the upper limbs
Deviation of the eyes and mouth
Maybe chills with a slight fever
manifestations.tongue: Pink or Pale or Slightly purple or purple spots
manifestations.tongueCoat: Thick and white or Thin and white (thicker than for Wind-Bi)
manifestations.pulse: Slippery or Slightly superficial or slightly rough or Slow and Soft or Wiry and tight or Floating and wiry or Superficial and tight
